quotes: Take a step back today, look at all those beautiful things you have.
Never regret yesterday. Life is in you today, and you make your tomorrow.
It always seems impossible until it's done
You're always one decision away from a totally different life
Every time you thought you couldn’t keep moving forward, you did. Take a moment to appreciate your strength.
Sometimes the smallest step in the right direction ends up being the biggest step of your life. Tip toe if you must, but take the step
If you understand the problem, you can solve the problem.
You’re braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
Winning doesn’t always mean being first.Winning means you’re doing better than you’ve done before.
Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you’ll start having positive results.
Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
The struggle you’re in today is developing the strength you need tomorrow.
The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
Be so happy that, when other people look at you, they become happy too.
Everyone is different. You can compare only similar things, not different
